content.value: Mami Dorme is known for its leisure adapted from Caribbean regions which satisfies all of our visitors regardless of their nationality. We are glad to mention that these experiences are easily found in our surroundings.

Barranquilla is a strong inspiration for international artists since culture, tradition, customs, and emotions are the essence of our atmosphere. Because of this we have the ability to give the traveler the joy, kindness, music, folklore, and dance that they expect from Barranquilla.
One of Mami Dorme's greatest components is Colombia's highly awaited Carnival of Barranquilla which has impacted the world with its abundant heritage.
During Carvanal, the hotel's capacity is exhausted, so make a reservation in advance!
Mamy Dorme Hostel invites you to the contagious Caribbean culture!

Mamy Dorme is located within an area whose republican colonial style offers us a number of cultures, landscapes and environment, with a turistic offer The statistics that constitute the intangible elements such as the environment, culture and the Caribbean landscape.
To all the above is added the leisure that comes from Caribbean regions and to which we must take advantage, since the foreign traveler, who is not the traditional tourist is on the lookout for experiences and novelties.

Barranquilla is a strong inspiration for artists of international stature, where their culture, tradition, custom, sensations and emotions are the essence, having an amazing ability to give the traveler, their joy, their kindness, their music, their folklore, their dance.
Under a natural context with a Caribbean mix, the Barranquilla Carnival constitutes an oral and intangible heritage of humanity, being Barranquilla a cultural city in which the hips can be moved at an international pace, but with a beautiful curramba flavor.
Mamy Dorme Hostel invites you to become infected with the Caribbean culture

description.description: Mamy Dorme Hostel is a colonial house offering a peaceful experience and a family oriented Caribbean atmosphere. We are also located in a safe area with a high cultural value that consists of tangible benefits such as the atmospheric culture of the Caribbean landscape.
